aside.title: Instructor's solution for
aside.p:
Usage notes: Vocabulary practice can be used at any time for an in-class activity. One version goes like this.
5 minutes: without consulting the text(s) or your notes, write definitions, facts, and example for some of the items in this section.
5 minutes: Use the text(s) to correct your own responses.
5 minutes: Volunteers share one or more items on the board. Brief summary discussion.
For variations, have people work in small groups for either or both of the first two phases. Ask students to give page references for definitions and facts.
